env.name: PBW_ENCRYPTION_KEY
env.label: PBW_ENCRYPTION_KEY
env.description: Your encryption key. Generate a strong one and store it in a safe place, as PG Back Web uses it to encrypt sensitive data

description: PostgreSQL, also known as Postgres, is a free and open-source relational database management system emphasizing extensibility and SQL compliance. Includes PGBackWeb for easy backups and restores.
name: postgresql
title: PostgreSQL
